SITE_LOGO.title: Site Logo
SITE_LOGO.description: It is used in marketplace order header.

COUNTRIES.title: Countries
COUNTRIES.description: It is used in organization creation dialog in order to limit country choices to predefined set.

INVITATION_MAX_AGE.title: Invitation Max Age
INVITATION_MAX_AGE.description: Max age of invitation token. It is used in approve and reject actions.

EXTENSIONS_AUTOREGISTER.title: Extensions Autoregister
EXTENSIONS_AUTOREGISTER.description: Defines whether extensions should be automatically registered.

ALLOW_SIGNUP_WITHOUT_INVITATION.description: Allow to signup without an invitation.

VALIDATE_INVITATION_EMAIL.title: Validate Invitation Email
VALIDATE_INVITATION_EMAIL.description: Ensure that invitation and user emails match.

TOKEN_LIFETIME.title: Token Lifetime
TOKEN_LIFETIME.description: Defines for how long user token should remain valid if there was no action from user.

INVITATION_LIFETIME.title: Invitation Lifetime
INVITATION_LIFETIME.description: Defines for how long invitation remains valid.

OWNERS_CAN_MANAGE_OWNERS.title: Owners Can Manage Owners
OWNERS_CAN_MANAGE_OWNERS.description: Enables organization owners to manage other organization owners.

OWNER_CAN_MANAGE_CUSTOMER.title: Owner Can Manage Customer
OWNER_CAN_MANAGE_CUSTOMER.description: Enables organization owners to create an organization.

BACKEND_FIELDS_EDITABLE.title: Backend Fields Editable
BACKEND_FIELDS_EDITABLE.description: Allows to control /admin writable fields. If this flag is disabled it is impossible to edit any field that corresponds to backend value via /admin. Such restriction allows to save information from corruption.

INITIAL_CUSTOMER_AGREEMENT_NUMBER.title: Initial Customer Agreement Number
INITIAL_CUSTOMER_AGREEMENT_NUMBER.description: Allows to tweak initial value of agreement number. It is assumed that organization owner should accept terms of services when organization is registered via Waldur HomePort.

CREATE_DEFAULT_PROJECT_ON_ORGANIZATION_C.title: Create Default Project On Organization Creation
CREATE_DEFAULT_PROJECT_ON_ORGANIZATION_C.description: Enables generation of the first project on organization creation.

ONLY_STAFF_MANAGES_SERVICES.title: Only Staff Manages Services
ONLY_STAFF_MANAGES_SERVICES.description: Allows to restrict provider management only to staff users.

NATIVE_NAME_ENABLED.title: Native Name Enabled
NATIVE_NAME_ENABLED.description: Allows to render native name field in customer and user forms.

SITE_NAME.title: Site Name
SITE_NAME.description: It is used in email notifications in order to refer to the current deployment in user-friendly way.

SITE_ADDRESS.title: Site Address
SITE_ADDRESS.description: It is used in marketplace order header.

SITE_EMAIL.title: Site Email
SITE_EMAIL.description: It is used in marketplace order header.

SITE_PHONE.title: Site Phone
SITE_PHONE.description: It is used in marketplace order header.

CURRENCY_NAME.title: Currency Name

LOGGING_REPORT_INTERVAL.description: Files older that specified interval are filtered out.

HTTP_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Chunk size for resource fetching from backend API. It is needed in order to avoid too long HTTP request error.

INVITATION_DISABLE_MULTIPLE_ROLES.title: Invitation Disable Multiple Roles

EMAIL_CHANGE_MAX_AGE.title: Email Change Max Age
